[[inst_hl_sbip]]
==== HL.SBIP

*Syntax:* hl.sbip SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sbip.svg[HL.SBIP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
